prompt: Provide text to structure as a Album object

artist.description: The artist or group who performed the album.
artist.title: Artist

release_date.description: The release date of the album.
release_date.title: Release Date

genre.description: The genre of music the album belongs to.
genre.title: Genre

track_count.description: Number of tracks in the album.
track_count.title: Track Count

duration.description: Total duration of the album in minutes.
duration.title: Duration

label.description: The record label that released the album.
label.title: Label

cover_url.description: URL to the album's cover image.
cover_url.title: Cover Url

title: Album
